entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
